name: KARUNAH SOCIETY FOR DEVELOPMENT

address: College Road, B/h. Cargo Honda Showroom,

briefDescription: We are recently registered society at Betul, MP, working for needy and backward communities in Betul District of Madhya Pradesh. We are working closely for socio economic welfare of NAHAR community working with Bhilwa nuts livelihood. We have started Activity Centre for 30+ kids not going to school. We are also doing research on tools that can help community in their livelihood. We have organized General Health Camp at Prabhat Pattan village and at Betul. More than 100+ community members were treated and given proper medicine at camp. Future Plans :1. To setup mobile health facility.2. To contribute in the area of quality education. 3. To organize community and to help with their traditional livelihood.
